name: AKASO GO
description: With the AKASO DV app, you can transfer images from the V50X to your phone for subsequent editing. At the same time, you can use this app to control the camera remotely, view the wonderful videos and pictures you have taken, and share your favorite moments to social media such as YouTube, Facebook and so on.  ------Main features----- Control your V50X: Capture the preview image simultaneously and remote control of the cameras basic functions in real time. Take photos and videos remotely easily. Playback the wonderful moment: Playback the photos and videos in real time. You can download, delete and edit the picture and video through the mobile phone. The large screen display is clearer. Share the moment of your life: Share the videos and images in the camera to the social media through the app, which lets your family and friends know more about your life.
